```{r}
library(traveltimeCLT)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
trips <- fread("data/trips.csv")
set.seed(1234)
id <- sample(unique(trips$trip), 2000)
Rprof("profile.out")
simulated_data <- similar_route(id, trips, sigma_n = 2, model = "t", significance = 0.5)
# similar_route(c(2700,2701), trips,r=5, significance=0.05)
Rprof(NULL)
summaryRprof("profile.out")
# check if s have NAs
any(is.na(simulated_data))

write.csv(simulated_data, "data/similarity_route_fiction.csv")
```
